title: get_current_archive_list Lambda Config
description: The input for the get_current_archive_list Lambda.

Records.description: A list of dicts from SQS. From example: https://www.juniper.net/documentation/us/en/software/jsa7.4.2/jsa-dsm/topics/concept/jsa-dsm-create-sqs-queue-and-configure-s3-objectcreated-notifications.html

items.description: An s3 event passed in by SQS.

awsRegion.description: The region containing the bucket the event occurred in.

bucket.description: Metadata for the bucket the event occurred in.

name.description: The name of the bucket the event occurred in.

object.description: Details about the file that the event occurred on.

key.description: The full path within the s3 bucket to the file that the event occurred on.
